info.name: Momio Ugly Emojis Replacement
info.description:
INFORMATION!
-- November 18, 2020: today momio replaced the emojis with even uglier ones, which is why this replacement no longer worked. now it works again! --

momio's emojis don't look really nice because of the black color and small details. With this theme, the emojis are replaced with normal colored and recognizable emojis.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 2 - November 18, 2020
Version 1 - November 6, 2020

for https://www.momio.me
